title: Be Careful What You Watch
itunes:title: Be Careful What You Watch
description:
Wednesday 10/3- Today on the show we had former Heavy Weight Champ Tyson Furry stop by, and he was speaking spicy when it came about discussing the upcoming fight against Deontay Wilder. He also spoke about having mental illness and much more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a much needed donkey and that it Donald Trump, for mocking Kavanaugh accuser Christine Blasey Ford and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
